name: The North Face Vectiv Exploris Mid Futurelight Light Trail Shoes - Women's
categories: Vectiv Exploris Mid Futurelight Light Trail S
description: Explore more. These running-inspired hiking boots are built to cover distance rapidly. The Vectiv midsole stabilizes your foot over rough terrain, while providing energy-return and forward propulsion. The ultra-breathable Futurelight™ membrane keeps water out and lets hot air escape, so your feet are cool and comfortable when you reach camp.Cordura™ ripstop mesh stands up to the rigours of the trail.FutureLight™ waterproof-breathable membrane.Rand overlays and a toe cap protect against bumps and scrapes.Mid-height collar supports and stabilizes your ankle.Eco-friendly Orthlite X55 footbed offers underfoot comfort.Supportive EVA midsole with rocker geometry provides a smooth step.3D TPU plate adds stability.Surface Control™ rubber with 4mm lugs grip solid or loose terrain.
